Abstract: John Noble Wilford article says there is sound scientific grounds for believing that there is extraterrestrial life, whose detection could be the most reverberating scientific discovery of the next century; photo (M)
Snippet: John Noble Wilford article says there is sound scientific grounds for believing that there is extraterrestrial life, whose detection could be the most reverberating scientific discovery of the next century; photo (M)
LeadParagraph: IF there is life here on Earth, why not elsewhere?

Headline.Main: Get Set to Say Hi To the Neighbors
